Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Halfpiece-FlavorText", "These sets are useful for creating walkways, balconies, trims and a range of other smaller constructions.")

Rows.Name: Item_Thatch_Roof_Half_Pitch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thatch_Roof_Half_Pitch-Description", "Shallow-sloped roof building elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thatch_Roof_Half_Pitch-FlavorText", "A two-part construction element, containing a base slope and an upper slope, for building low-pitched roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Roof_Half_Pitch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Roof_Half_Pitch-Description", "Shallow-sloped roof building elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Roof_Half_Pitch-FlavorText", "A two part construction element, containing a base slope and an upper slope, for building low-pitched roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Roof_Half_Pitch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Roof_Half_Pitch-Description", "Shallow-sloped roof building elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Roof_Half_Pitch-FlavorText", "A two part construction element, containing a base slope and an upper slope, for building low-pitched roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Refined_Roof_Half_Pitch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Roof_Half_Pitch-Description", "Shallow-sloped roof building elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Roof_Half_Pitch-FlavorText", "A two part construction element, containing a base slope and an upper slope, for building low-pitched roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Roof_Half_Pitch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Roof_Half_Pitch-Description", "Shallow-sloped roof building elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Roof_Half_Pitch-FlavorText", "A two part construction element, containing a base slope and an upper slope, for building low-pitched roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Roof_Half_Pitch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Roof_Half_Pitch-Description", "Shallow-sloped roof building elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Roof_Half_Pitch-FlavorText", "A two part construction element, containing a base slope and an upper slope, for building low-pitched roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Roof_Half_Pitch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Roof_Half_Pitch-Description", "Shallow-sloped roof building elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Roof_Half_Pitch-FlavorText", "A two part construction element, containing a base slope and an upper slope, for building low-pitched roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Movement
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Movement-Description", "Experimental, exotics-assisted movement enhancement unit.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Movement-FlavorText", "Experiments by Larkwell Martinez into the gravitational effects of exotics have resulted in a prototype known as the \'Dampener\', which slightly lowers local mass, allowing swifter movement.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Carry_Weight
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Carry_Weight-Description", "Electro-active device that \'hijacks\' metallic envirosuit fibers to create a \'virtual exoskeleton\' that enhances carry capacity.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Carry_Weight-FlavorText", "Electro-active shape-memory fibers are highly flexible under normal conditions, but become rigid when exposed to an electric charge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Poison_Resistance
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Poison_Resistance-Description", "Releases a steady micro dose of antivenom, enhancing poison resistance.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Poison_Resistance-FlavorText", "The Detoxifier is classified under UDA regulations as technically qualifying users as a cyborg.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Fire_Resistance
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Fire_Resistance-Description", "Improves fire resistance by harnessing exotics\' quasi-negative mass to create a nonlinear energy sink.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Fire_Resistance-FlavorText", "The sudden abundance of exotic matter produced an immense range of technological innovation in an exceedingly short time, resulting in an era for which the world \'renaissance\' is barely adequate.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Inventory_Slots
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Inventory_Slots-Description", "Provides two extra inventory slots.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Inventory_Slots-FlavorText", "High-tech pockets.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Inventory_Slots_2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Inventory_Slots_2-Description", "Provides five extra inventory slots.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Inventory_Slots_2-FlavorText", "High-tech pockets.")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Consumption
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Consumption-Description", "Micro-doses the user with a high-potency enzyme supplement to reduce food, water and oxygen consumption.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Consumption-FlavorText", "\"Like terraforming for your body.\" - Anonymous Group 15 researcher")

Rows.Name: Item_Module_Fall_Damage
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Fall_Damage-Description", "Drastic movement causes a piezoelectric sensor to deliver an electric charge to a small fragment of exotics, briefly reducing mass and diminishing fall damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Module_Fall_Damage-FlavorText", "TL;DR: Dark magic")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Alpha-Description", "A single-bit axe with 3D-printed handle and metallic head.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Alpha-FlavorText", "While the Heike delivers a lot more wood with every strike, this lightweight power comes at the cost of swifter wear and tear.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Beta-Description", "An efficient, if less than durable harvesting implement.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Beta-FlavorText", "Shengong Inc. was founded by Sinotai in 2082 CE.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Charlie-Description", "A basic, but respectable felling tool.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Charlie-FlavorText", "For a single, simple reason, handtools such as this experienced a resurgence as humanity settle worlds other than Earth: reliability.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Alpha-Description", "A high yield, heavy mining tool from an industrial giant.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Alpha-FlavorText", "Typically for Shengong, the Kuang\'s weight translates to power and improved results, but tends to slow and tire its users.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Beta-Description", "A robust and hard-bladed alloy steel mining axe.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Beta-FlavorText", "A tool to break the soil of many worlds.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Charlie-Description", "A serviceable pickaxe, but easily repaired.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Charlie-FlavorText", "Until it came to seem outdated, Shengong branded itself as \'Armorer to the Solar System\'.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Delta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Delta-Description", "A basic pickaxe, robust if mass-produced.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Delta-FlavorText", "\"A pick axe ain\'t never run outta power.\" - Sol Berlinski")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Alpha-Description", "A heavy, powerful blade, but takes extra energy to use effectively.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Alpha-FlavorText", "An iconic knife found wherever humanity has spread, the Qie\'s weight makes it a potent, if sometimes punishing weapon.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Beta-Description", "Resilient, if unremarkable.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Beta-FlavorText", "\'The knife of the family does not cut.\' ~ Proverb")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Charlie-Description", "A strong, if weighty close quarters weapon.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Charlie-FlavorText", "\'A knife does not recognise its owner.\' ~ Proverb")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Delta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Delta-Description", "A basic but brutal straight-back skinning knife.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Delta-FlavorText", "A rough weapon for tough conditions - slice, skin, stab or throw the Sichou, and watch your fingers.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Alpha-Description", "The Xingxing may not excell in any area, but represents unalloyed adequacy.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Alpha-FlavorText", "No weapons are more widespread in human space than Shengong\'s.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Beta-Description", "Doesn\'t need to last a lifetime, to save one.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Beta-FlavorText", "Shengong\'s designs excell in no particular areas, but as a result have produced many classics of design economy.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Charlie-Description", "A decent spear that knows exactly what it is.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Charlie-FlavorText", "Shengong is a subsidary of Asia\'s space administration, Sinotai. Its operation may be highly beauracratic, but its products are legendary for their efficiency.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Detla
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Detla-Description", "A minor miracle of low cost production.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Detla-FlavorText", "There\'s a beauty to economy.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Hammer_Shengong_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Hammer_Shengong_Alpha-Description", "A highly economic and affordable repair hammer, like so many Shengong products.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Hammer_Shengong_Alpha-FlavorText", "Shengong resolve the scarcity of replacement parts in space by ensuring its products share many common parts.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Hammer_Shengong_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Hammer_Shengong_Beta-Description", "A highly economic and affordable design, like so many Shengong products.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Hammer_Shengong_Beta-FlavorText", "From hammers to space stations, Shengong Inc makes it all.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Alpha-Description", "An affordable, reliable and efficient bow with acceptable performance.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Alpha-FlavorText", "Shengong designs are not designed to last, but rather, for ease of repair, being defined by the high degree of interchangeability of parts between their products.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Beta-Description", "A powerful, if not especially durable recurve design.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Beta-FlavorText", "Silent, deadly, affordable.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Charlie-Description", "Decently accurate, modestly priced.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Charlie-FlavorText", "A Shengong knock-off of a classic design.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Arrow_Shengong
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Shengong-Description", "Arrows of decent quality, if unremarkable performance.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Shengong-FlavorText", "Shengong is the sister company of C.H.A.C., specializing in off-world equipment and weaponry.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Shengong
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Shengong-Description", "25 arrows of decent quality, if unremarkable performance. \'CONSUME\' to open bundle.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Shengong-FlavorText", "Shengong Inc. are a wholly owned subsidary of Sinotai.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Oxygen_Tank_Shengong
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Oxygen_Tank_Shengong-Description", "A cheap, reliable air system.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Oxygen_Tank_Shengong-FlavorText", "Named in memory of Yang Liwei.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Canteen_Shengong
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Canteen_Shengong-Description", "A durable and economic water container.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Canteen_Shengong-FlavorText", "Exactly how the Hulu became such an icon of off-world existence is lost in a froth of interplanetary memes.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Bandage_Shengong
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Bandage_Shengong-Description", "Antimicrobial impregnated gauze bandages.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Bandage_Shengong-FlavorText", "Heals the hurt.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Axe_Printed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe_Printed-Description", "A low grade 3D-printed metal axe.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Axe_Printed-FlavorText", "The MX Collective provides 90% of printing designs to the ever-expanding AM market.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Printed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Printed-Description", "An entry-level 3D printed metal pickaxe.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Printed-FlavorText", "The MX Collective provides a vast range of AM designs for a small licensing fee.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Knife_Printed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Printed-Description", "A 3D printed metal hunting knife of no great quality.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Knife_Printed-FlavorText", "A staple of metallic AM printing, which has probably made its designer a small fortune in licensing fees.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Spear_Printed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Printed-Description", "A low quality, but perfectly serviceable 3D printed spear.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Spear_Printed-FlavorText", "Using techniques pioneered in the early 21st century, additive manufacturing has rendered metal the new plastic.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Firewhacker_Printed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Firewhacker_Printed-Description", "A 3D printed fire fighting device.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Firewhacker_Printed-FlavorText", "Print, whack, snap, repeat.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Alpha-Description", "A box of low-cost metallic 3D printed arrows, spiked with poison refined from Icarus marine life.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Alpha-FlavorText", "With the advent of widespread, domestic metallic 3D printing, modern archery entered a golden age of specialist bickering about arow design and composition.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Beta-Description", "3D printed arrows tipped with a fast-acting nerve agent that slows targets.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Beta-FlavorText", "The non-lethal, but highly effective toxin skirts a number of international - and interplanetary - chemical weapons agreements.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Charlie-Description", "Metallic 3D printed arrows with a micro-barbed head designed for inflicting lethal wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Charlie-FlavorText", "The legality of these projectiles is currently unclear.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Alpha-Description", "Five low-cost, metallic 3D printed arrows, spiked with poison refined from Icarus marine life. \'CONSUME\' to open bundle.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Alpha-FlavorText", "If you hit, it\'s skill, if you miss, it\'s the rapidly crafted, low quality projectiles.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Beta-Description", "Five arrows tipped with a rapid-action nerve agent that slows targets. \'CONSUME\' to open bundle.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Beta-FlavorText", "Additive manufacturing became the production process of choice following much needed advances in micro-recycling, which allowed almost any mettalic compound to be processed, purified and reused as print material.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Charlie-Description", "Five swiftly printed metal polymer arrows with micro-barbed heads, designed to inflict more lethal wounds. \'CONSUME\' to open bundle.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Charlie-FlavorText", "The legality of these projectiles is currently unclear.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Cot_Printed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Cot_Printed-Description", "A portable, collapsible sleeping surface.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Cot_Printed-FlavorText", "Rest, restore energy, respawn as required.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Coal_Set
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Coal_Set-Description", "A 25 unit stack of high density petrochemical material, refined from cometary hydrocarbons.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Coal_Set-FlavorText", "Retrieved, processed, compressed from stellar leftovers.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Coal
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Coal-Description", "A high density petrochemical material refined from cometary hydrocarbons.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Coal-FlavorText", "Comets are formed from material that never became planets, let alone stars. Burning it\'s the next best thing.")

Rows.Name: Item_Pumpkin
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pumpkin-Description", "A deep yellow squash cultivar.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pumpkin-FlavorText", "Ensuring that Halloween becomes a multi-planet holiday. Best cooked.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mushroom
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mushroom-Description", "A nutritious fungus, can be eaten raw, but best fried.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mushroom-FlavorText", "The full implications of introducing fungi to a new world are yet to be seen.")

Rows.Name: Item_Squash
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Squash-Description", "An edible herbaceous vine fruit.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Squash-FlavorText", "A myriad of squash varieties exist, but the effects of genetic tampering by xeno-biologiest have resulted in a variant with noticeable endurance-enhancing qualities.")

Rows.Name: Item_Watermelon
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Watermelon-Description", "Mainly water and sugar.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Watermelon-FlavorText", "Icarus produces approximately 0.003% of humanity\'s watermelons.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooked_Corn
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Corn-Description", "Grilled to perfection, depending on your standards.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Corn-FlavorText", "A source of fuel for humans, animals and machines alike.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooked_Pumpkin
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Pumpkin-Description", "Lightly charred, fairly delicious.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Pumpkin-FlavorText", "The pumpkins natural beta-carotene improves endurance.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooked_Squash
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Squash-Description", "Like roast pumpkin, boasting a similar flavor and most of the same effects.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Squash-FlavorText", "Boosts stamina, if not the will to live.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooked_Carrot
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Carrot-Description", "New planet, new rules.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Carrot-FlavorText", "Boosts stamina slightly, may prompt angst.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooked_Mushroom
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Mushroom-Description", "Lightly fried fungus.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Mushroom-FlavorText", "Mushrooms are notably the only lifeform introduced from Earth that required no genetic adjustment whatsoever.")

Rows.Name: Item_Corn_Soup
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Corn_Soup-Description", "A classic dish, even without shredded chicken.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Corn_Soup-FlavorText", "Boosts stamina and improves endurance. Drains nostalgia.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fruit_Salad
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fruit_Salad-Description", "An all-natural, surprisingly delicious melon-berry mix, boosts stamina and health.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fruit_Salad-FlavorText", "A divisive desert, loved or hated, and very little in between.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mushroom_Soup
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mushroom_Soup-Description", "A passable impression of a classic dish.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mushroom_Soup-FlavorText", "While some critics regard this meal as pointless if made without butter, purists do not last long on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wild_Salad
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wild_Salad-Description", "Mixed pieces of squash and pumpkin at room temperature.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wild_Salad-FlavorText", "At home among the stars, yet no closer to answering the age old question: \'What is a salad, exactly?\'")

Rows.Name: Item_Meat_Stew
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meat_Stew-Description", "A rich, nourishing casserole.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meat_Stew-FlavorText", "Some foods profit from rustic conditions. Boosts health, lifts stamina.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fried_Soy_Beans
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fried_Soy_Beans-Description", "Boosts health, lifts stamina, enhances self-satisfaction.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fried_Soy_Beans-FlavorText", "One of the original crops intended to sustain humanity on its first new extra-solar world.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fish_Dish
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fish_Dish-Description", "A simple curry with a large health boost.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fish_Dish-FlavorText", "Not the best fish curry in the galaxy, but far from the worst.")

Rows.Name: Item_Creamed_Corn
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Creamed_Corn-Description", "Pureed corn, animal fat and water, easy to digest.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Creamed_Corn-FlavorText", "Slow release energy with a baby-food consistency, boosting health and stamina.")

Rows.Name: Item_Roasted_Vegetables
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Roasted_Vegetables-Description", "A melange of cooked vegetables, provides a serious stamina boost.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Roasted_Vegetables-FlavorText", "MELANGE: n. \"a varied mixture\"")

Rows.Name: Item_Animal_Fat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Animal_Fat-Description", "The next best thing to butter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Animal_Fat-FlavorText", "A key ingredient in energy dense cooking, life on any world would be almost unliveable without some kind of lipid. ")

Rows.Name: Item_Pastry
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pastry-Description", "A simple but satisfying shortcrust pastry.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pastry-FlavorText", "\'Icarus was only truly colonized when we began making pastry on that planet\' - Jacques Merrida")

Rows.Name: Item_Fruit_Pie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fruit_Pie-Description", "Watermelon plus berries and pastry creates a passable, stamina boosting pie.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fruit_Pie-FlavorText", "Watermelons invite experimental cookery.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meat_Pie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meat_Pie-Description", "A rustic pie that delivers a big health boost.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meat_Pie-FlavorText", "\"Stress cannot exist in the presence of a pie.\" - David Mamet")

Rows.Name: Item_Vegetable_Pie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Vegetable_Pie-Description", "Warm, health-giving, stamina-boosting - virtue in every pie.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Vegetable_Pie-FlavorText", "If this pie had a slogan, it might be \'Stay delicious\'.")

Rows.Name: Item_Pumpkin_Bread
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pumpkin_Bread-Description", "A noticeably yellow loaf that significantly increases endurance.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pumpkin_Bread-FlavorText", "Just like \'someone\' used to make.")

Rows.Name: Item_Crumbed_Fish_Fillet
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Crumbed_Fish_Fillet-Description", "Battered in breadcrumbs, lightly fried, boosts health and stamina.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Crumbed_Fish_Fillet-FlavorText", "Bread meets fish.")

Rows.Name: Item_Pickled_Carrot
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pickled_Carrot-Description", "An acquired taste, boosts stamina.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Pickled_Carrot-FlavorText", "Like many other ancient ways, pickling has found a place on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Chemistry_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Chemistry_Bench-Description", "A rough but effective laboratory.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Chemistry_Bench-FlavorText", "Unlikely to win anyone a Nobel Prize, but sufficient for the average Icarus alchemist.")

Rows.Name: Item_Water_Generator
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Water_Generator-Description", "A combined wheel and generator, turns fluid motion into angular momentum.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Water_Generator-FlavorText", "Still one of humanity\'s greatest ideas.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sprinkler
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sprinkler-Description", "Fire reduction, just add water.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sprinkler-FlavorText", "Must be connected to a water source.")

Rows.Name: Item_Electric_Armor_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Electric_Armor_Bench-Description", "Powered workbench for advanced armor tooling and production.")

Rows.Name: Item_Masonry_Bench_T4
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Masonry_Bench_T4-Description", "Powered bench for heavy stonework and carving.")

Rows.Name: Item_Composter_Electric
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composter_Electric-Description", "Advanced biofuel unit for accelerated production.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composter_Electric-FlavorText", "An upshot of the Climate Emergency was a focus on efficient, sustainable technology that squeezes every ounce of energy from nature.")

Rows.Name: Item_Electric_Stove
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Electric_Stove-Description", "A swifter, safer cooking system.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Kitchen_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Kitchen_Bench-Description", "A full food and herbal preparation area.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Kitchen_Storage
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Kitchen_Storage-Description", "The best cabinets this planet can offer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Kitchen_Sink
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Kitchen_Sink-Description", "Fully plumbed basin and running water, a luxury of sorts.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Buffalo
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Buffalo-Description", "No longer roaming.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Buffalo-FlavorText", "Often confused with bison.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cocoa
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cocoa-Description", "Fruit of the cocoa tree.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cocoa-FlavorText", "Mesoamerica\'s second greatest export.")

Rows.Name: Item_Coffee
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Coffee-Description", "Seed of the coffee plant.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Coffee-FlavorText", "Humanity was never going to last long in Icarus without it.")

Rows.Name: Item_GreenTea
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_GreenTea-Description", "Unprocessed leaves from a variant of the common tea tree.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_GreenTea-FlavorText", "Empires were built on less.")

Rows.Name: Item_WildTea
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_WildTea-Description", "Gorse flowers, can be turned into a warming drink.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_WildTea-FlavorText", "Whether invited or not, gorse followed humanity to Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Antibiotic_Vaccine_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antibiotic_Vaccine_Alpha-Description", "Provides temporary immunity to a range of infections commonly encountered on Icarus, including pneumonia and infected wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antibiotic_Vaccine_Alpha-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Antibiotic_Vaccine_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antibiotic_Vaccine_Beta-Description", "Provides temporary immunity to a range of infections commonly encountered on Icarus, including pneumonia and infected wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antibiotic_Vaccine_Beta-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Antibiotic_Vaccine_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antibiotic_Vaccine_Charlie-Description", "Provides extended immunity to a range of infections commonly encountered on Icarus, including pneumonia and infected wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antibiotic_Vaccine_Charlie-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Antipoison_Vaccine_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antipoison_Vaccine_Alpha-Description", "Temporarily protects againsty various Icarusian poisons.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antipoison_Vaccine_Alpha-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Antipoison_Vaccine_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antipoison_Vaccine_Beta-Description", "Temporary protection againsty various Icarusian poisons.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antipoison_Vaccine_Beta-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Antipoison_Vaccine_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antipoison_Vaccine_Charlie-Description", "Extended protection againsty various Icarusian poisons.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antipoison_Vaccine_Charlie-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Antiparasitic_Vaccine_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antiparasitic_Vaccine_Alpha-Description", "Temporary, heavyweight prevention against festering wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antiparasitic_Vaccine_Alpha-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Antiparasitic_Vaccine_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antiparasitic_Vaccine_Beta-Description", "Temporary, heavyweight prevention against festering wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antiparasitic_Vaccine_Beta-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Antiparasitic_Vaccine_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antiparasitic_Vaccine_Charlie-Description", "Extended heavyweight prevention against festering wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Antiparasitic_Vaccine_Charlie-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Blood_Thinning_Vaccines_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Blood_Thinning_Vaccines_Alpha-Description", "A cocktail of anti-inflammatories, steroids and stimulants that temporarily protect against the effects of contusions and concussions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Blood_Thinning_Vaccines_Alpha-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Blood_Thinning_Vaccines_Beta
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Blood_Thinning_Vaccines_Beta-Description", "A cocktail of anti-inflammatories, steroids and stimulants that temporarily protect against the effects of contusions and concussions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Blood_Thinning_Vaccines_Beta-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Blood_Thinning_Vaccines_Charlie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Blood_Thinning_Vaccines_Charlie-Description", "A cocktail of anti-inflammatories, steroids and stimulants that temporarily protect against the effects of contusions and concussions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Blood_Thinning_Vaccines_Charlie-FlavorText", "Strong but short-acting, these phage-based vaccines generally last for several days - long enough to cover most expeditions to the surface.")

Rows.Name: Item_Electric_Dehumidier
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Electric_Dehumidier-Description", "Diminishes such health risks as pneumonia, while also seeming to dispel cave worms.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Electric_Dehumidier-FlavorText", "Whether cave worms are offended by the sudden aridity it produces, or the high pitched whine, research is yet to confirm.")

Rows.Name: Item_Faction_Mission_Laser
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Faction_Mission_Laser-Description", "A high intensity strontium vapor laser prototype. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Faction_Mission_Laser-FlavorText", "Exactly why Group 15 had experimental weapons grade laser equipment lying around is anyone\'s guess.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_Sonic_Disrupter
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Sonic_Disrupter-Description", "An experimental device for projecting densely clustered micro-shockwaves in a gas medium.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Sonic_Disrupter-FlavorText", "A product of collaborative research between Group 15 and one of Larkwell Martinez\'s non-lethal weapons research units.")

Rows.Name: Item_Heater_Large
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Heater_Large-Description", "A powered heating device for warming larger areas.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Heater_Large-FlavorText", "Entropy is your friend.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooler_Large
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooler_Large-Description", "A powered heat exchange unit for cooling larger areas.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooler_Large-FlavorText", "Stay frosty.")

Rows.Name: Item_WaterWheel_Generator
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_WaterWheel_Generator-Description", "A combined wheel and generator, turns fluid motion into angular momentum.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_WaterWheel_Generator-FlavorText", "Still one of humanity\'s greatest ideas.")

Rows.Name: Item_HighTech_1
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_HighTech_1-Description", "A small, minutely detailed object, extremely light to hold.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_HighTech_1-FlavorText", "Close attention reveals a faint humming, or perhaps you are imagining it.")

Rows.Name: Item_HighTech_2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_HighTech_2-Description", "A clearly functional item, with no clear function.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_HighTech_2-FlavorText", "Something about this device feels immensely old.")

Rows.Name: Item_HighTech_3
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_HighTech_3-Description", "An ornately manufactured device of uncertain materials.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_HighTech_3-FlavorText", "Wherever this came from, and whoever made it, you are certain you\'ve never seen anything like it before.")

Rows.Name: Item_HighTech_Assembled
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_HighTech_Assembled-Description", "A device of uncertain age, properties and origin.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_HighTech_Assembled-FlavorText", "Something about this device just feels wrong, though whether it\'s the uncanny weight, the extraordinary intricacy, its arcane purpose, or something else, who can say?")

Rows.Name: Item_Basic_Wall_Light
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Wall_Light-Description", "A wall-mounted lamp, providing wide illumination, needing power.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Wall_Light-FlavorText", "\"Darkness cannot drive out darkness.\"")

Rows.Name: Item_Basic_Ceiling_Light
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Ceiling_Light-Description", "A ceiling-mounted lamp, providing wide illumination, needing power.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Ceiling_Light-FlavorText", "\"We forgive children who are afraid of the dark. The tragedy is adults afraid of the light.\" - Plato")

Rows.Name: Item_Faction_Mission_WallDrill
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Faction_Mission_WallDrill-Description", "An industrial-grade, portable electric mining rig designed for horizontal aperture drilling.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Faction_Mission_WallDrill-FlavorText", "This micro-derrick rig was adapted from Inaris-designed asteroid mining equipment used in the early 22nd century.")

Rows.Name: Item_Thermos_GreenTea
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thermos_GreenTea-Description", "A nourishing, warming drink that soothes the spirit.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thermos_GreenTea-FlavorText", "Arguably humanity\'s single greatest contribution to the galaxy.")

Rows.Name: Item_Thermos_WildTea
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thermos_WildTea-Description", "A slightly bitter, warming beverage that reduces thirst.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thermos_WildTea-FlavorText", "Smells a little like coconut.")

Rows.Name: Item_Thermos_Cocoa
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thermos_Cocoa-Description", "A savory chocolate drink that slows hunger, and warms.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thermos_Cocoa-FlavorText", "In the absence of sugar, Icarus\'s cocoa drinks return to a classical, savory \'Spanish\' style.")

Rows.Name: Item_Thermos_Coffee
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thermos_Coffee-Description", "Do more.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thermos_Coffee-FlavorText", "If it didn\'t shield you from the leaden weight of fatigue, it wouldn\'t be coffee.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mesh_Backpack
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mesh_Backpack-Description", "A tough leather backpack that increases inventory space, carry weight capacity and reduces the weight of ore.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mesh_Backpack-FlavorText", "Sol Berlinski, now Lagos Unit dispatcher on Ceres Station, claims the design of the \'quietly iconic\' prospector\'s basic backpack was taught to him personally by Mo Chou.")

Rows.Name: Item_Delivery_Object
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Delivery_Object-Description", "A fragile flechette flask containing temperature-sensitive terraforming enzyme payload.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Delivery_Object-FlavorText", "Following the ban on terraforming, Inaris continued to secretly pursue the technology under the protection of their owner-directors, Uniao.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mining_Backpack
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mining_Backpack-Description", "A reinforced backpack that greatly reduces the weight of ore and wood carried.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mining_Backpack-FlavorText", "For long-distance hauling and concerted construction pushes, the triple-layer leatherwork and heavy framing greatly reduces burdens.")

Rows.Name: Item_Basic_Quiver
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Quiver-Description", "Dedicated arrow storage, allowing faster reloading, swifter aiming and higher arrow speeds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Quiver-FlavorText", "Quick access for faster kills.")

Rows.Name: Item_Basic_Bandolier
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Bandolier-Description", "A wearable ammo store, reducing firearms weight and reload speed.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Bandolier-FlavorText", "A bit like Chewbacca.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bait
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bait-Description", "A highly \'fragrant\' animal lure.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bait-FlavorText", "You\'d hate it.")

Rows.Name: Item_Poisoned_Bait
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Poisoned_Bait-Description", "A poison-laced animal lure.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Poisoned_Bait-FlavorText", "Keep away from pets and children.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Cupboard_Small
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Cupboard_Small-Description", "A modest wooden cupboard for storing small items.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Cupboard_Small-FlavorText", "Has 10 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Interior_Wood_Cupboard_Small
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Interior_Wood_Cupboard_Small-Description", "A small storage unit for items.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Interior_Wood_Cupboard_Small-FlavorText", "Has 10 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Cupboard_Small
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Cupboard_Small-Description", "Strong protective storage for items.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Cupboard_Small-FlavorText", "Has 15 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Campfire_Printed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Campfire_Printed-Description", "A simple, prefabricated campfire for heat, light and cooking, designed to remain lit under all conditions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Campfire_Printed-FlavorText", "Ancient technolgy meets modern construction.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Sickle_Printed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Sickle_Printed-Description", "A metallic polymer blade, increasing harvesting yield.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Sickle_Printed-FlavorText", "MXC is a highly successful collective focused on licensing 3D printing blueprints.")

Rows.Name: Item_Faction_Mission_AquaScanner
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Faction_Mission_AquaScanner-Description", "A multi-purpose water monitoring, sampling and analysis station.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Faction_Mission_AquaScanner-FlavorText", "Hydrology is an often overlooked, but critical discipline, foundational to an astonishing array of scientific endeavor.")

Rows.Name: Item_Deep_Mining_Drill_Electric
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Deep_Mining_Drill_Electric-Description", "A convenient device that runs on electricity")
